issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

After bundling, uploading and registering an ERI, EKI and EMI, the following error can be seen when launching the image:
{code}
# euca-register -n trusty-server-cloudimg-paravirt trusty-server-paravirt-20140409-v2/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml
IMAGE	emi-7ad360df
# euca-run-instances -k euca-admin -g test-group -t m1.xlarge emi-7ad360df
euca-run-instances: error (InternalFailure): Failed to send message RunInstancesType to service EucalyptusRequestQueueSync because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType
{code}
However, if euca-run-instances is ran again using the same EMI, it *seems* to run successfully.  However, its launches the Image Worker EMI (which was never launched at any point of this cloud's life span:
{code}
# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-01008bde	244437812323	test-group
INSTANCE	i-52479927	emi-c2ac9be6	10.104.6.231	172.18.0.106	running	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-04-08T22:46:31.840Z	Mastermind				monitoring-disabled	10.104.6.231	172.18.0.106			instance-store					hvm			sg-102499ec
TAG	instance	i-52479927	euca:node	10.104.10.22
# euca-run-instances -k euca-admin -g test-group -t m1.xlarge emi-7ad360df
RESERVATION	r-ceec1a10	244437812323	test-group
INSTANCE	i-610531ee	emi-7ad360df	172.18.0.132	172.18.0.132	pending	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-04-09T16:09:02.706Z	Mastermind				monitoring-disabled	172.18.0.132	172.18.0.132			instance-store					hvm			sg-102499ec
# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-01008bde	244437812323	test-group
INSTANCE	i-52479927	emi-c2ac9be6	10.104.6.231	172.18.0.106	running	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-04-08T22:46:31.840Z	Mastermind				monitoring-disabled	10.104.6.231	172.18.0.106			instance-store					hvm			sg-102499ec
TAG	instance	i-52479927	euca:node	10.104.10.22
RESERVATION	r-8c78749b	244437812323	euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
INSTANCE	i-19020ef4	emi-d707ba64	10.104.6.232	172.18.0.145	running		0		m1.small	2014-04-09T15:57:10.177Z	Mastermind				monitoring-enabled	10.104.6.232	172.18.0.145			instance-store					hvm		7d46b8c9-d201-4b25-b6ba-383ac3d54ea1_Mastermind_1	sg-0dcd4ea7			arn:aws:iam::244437812323:instance-profile/internal/imaging/imaging-worker-01
TAG	instance	i-19020ef4	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-19020ef4	aws:autoscaling:groupName	asg-euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
TAG	instance	i-19020ef4	euca:node	10.104.10.22
{code}

*Signs*

Wed Apr 9 08:57:32 2014 ERROR [VmControl:Compute.15] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmControl.runInstances(VmControl.java):251] java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to lookup image named: emi-7ad360df

*Pertinent Data*

Instance stored-backed HVM EMIs work just fine. This only affects paravirtual EMIs (i.e. images that are registered with an EKI and ERI).
fields.summary: EMI Registered with ERI and EKI Fails to Launch as Paravirt, but launches as an Image Worker HVM?
fields.environment:
* 1 x FrontEnd (DB, Walrus, OSG, CloudWatch, IAM, AutoScaling, Storage Controller, Cluster Controller)
* 1 x NC

comments.body:
Eucalyptus 4.0 development version:
{code}
[root@odc-c-11 ~]# rpm -qa | grep euca
eucalyptus-blockdev-utils-4.0.0-0.0.848.20140408gitc58d7293.el6.x86_64

Registration of paravirtual images is still TBD for 4.0
I think we need to improve logging on the run-instance failure where the target emi is in pending state.
